snippet: French soldiers recovered a stash of explosives on Wednesday that the authorities believed radical Islamic fighters were using to make bombs, a Malian military spokesman said.
abstract: French soldiers recover stash of explosives in Mali that authorities believe radical Islamist fighters were using to make bombs; find raises fears that jihadists could be preparing to stage attacks on civilians.
lead_paragraph: French soldiers recovered a stash of explosives on Wednesday that the authorities believed radical Islamic fighters were using to make bombs, a Malian military spokesman said.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
